citations.desc: ATTENDING VETERINARIAN AND ADEQUATE VETERINARY CARE (DEALERS AND EXHIBITORS).
citations.narrative:
One female rabbit in Barn 1, Row 7, Cage 150 was observed with a reddened, swollen, and dirty genital area that
appeared inflamed and infected. No treatment had been given. Need to provide adequate vet care or euthanasia
to prevent further pain/distress to animal. Correct by June 13, 2014.

In Barn 5 there were two cages of young, weaned rabbits housed in cages providing 7.5 sq. ft holding 10-11 young
rabbits 3-4 lbs. each. This many rabbits this size require 15 and 16.5 sq. ft respectively. Need to provide required
cage space for adequate freedom of movement.
Exit briefing conducted with facility representative.

narrative:
2.40(b)(2)           DIRECT
ATTENDING VETERINARIAN AND ADEQUATE VETERINARY CARE (DEALERS AND EXHIBITORS).
One female rabbit in Barn 1, Row 7, Cage 150 was observed with a reddened, swollen, and dirty genital area that
appeared inflamed and infected.  No treatment had been given.  Need to provide adequate vet care or euthanasia
to prevent further pain/distress to animal.  Correct by June 13, 2014.
3.53(c)                    REPEAT
PRIMARY ENCLOSURES.   
In Barn 5 there were two cages of young, weaned rabbits housed in cages providing 7.5 sq. ft holding 10-11 young
rabbits 3-4 lbs. each. This many rabbits this size require 15 and 16.5 sq. ft respectively.   Need to provide required
cage space for adequate freedom of movement.  
Exit briefing conducted with facility representative.
